page.title: 19SHOPPING SURVEY LOWER HEATH
page.content: We took a survey of 33 families. {FOOD.}There is only one shop in Lower Heath(not in Domesday block).It keeps basic groceries only. 78% shopped for food in{Whitchurch }(6 miles away).82% shopped weekly for food and{Friday}was the most popular day.For{frozen food most people(52%) went to{Shrewsbury(14 miles).Other centres used were{Market {Drayton and Wem. {CLOTHES}People often used more than one centre. 69% went to Shrewsbury, 48% used Whitchurch. Other centres used were{Wem, Market Drayton,Telford, {Chester,Hanley,Birkenhead, and {Wolverhampton.}4% used a catalogue for buying clothes.Shrewsbury was also the most used place for buying shoes. {TOYS,ELECTRICAL GOODS.}Shrewsbury was again the most popular choice.Some people bought second-hand through adverts in the 'Shropshire Star'.
